occupation: Lecturer at Scarlet C Suite Program Illinois Tech
headline: 𝗘𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿 #Money IQ ⋆ ¹Optimizing Families' #FinancialHygiene ✫ 𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗿 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 ⋆ ²I Position Students Before They Need The Job
summary:
Educating and Empowering Families: 𝗣𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗱𝗼𝗻’𝘁 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗳𝗮𝗶𝗹, 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝘆 𝗷𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗳𝗮𝗶𝗹 𝘁𝗼 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻 due to lack of #FinancialHygiene #Money IQ knowledge. World System Builder champions empowerment -- thirteen (13) free Zoom workshops weekly. We help you with basics to navigate financial complexities for your self-determined future.

⁰𝗦𝘁𝘂𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀: Send me a Connect request (vs. Follow) for hands-on initiating/nurturing business relationships 'cold.'

¹𝗚𝗿𝗮𝗱𝘂𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀: Land your first job quicker than average [3 - 12 months]. Start getting Return on Investment [ROI] sooner on your $40K+ tuition paid ... email Bernie@BernieFloresca.com for my eBook, Get Hired Fast: Five Focus Areas.

Also, see #OneMinute Career Services tips in Featured below, and more on #GraduateToHired YouTube channel.  
💡 https://www.youtube.com/user/berniefloresca

🅱🅴🆁🅽🅸🅴 🅵🅻🅾🆁🅴🆂🅲🅰 is an educator who is a natural at bringing out the best in people. Bernie holds an M.S. in electrical engineering, and is trained in leadership, communication, and coaching from Landmark Education. His background includes decades as Adjunct Faculty at DeVry University / McHenry County College, program manager for AT&T Bell Laboratories, career consultant at Illinois Institute of Technology, and #Money IQ educator at 𝗧𝗵𝗲𝗕𝗲𝗿𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗙𝗹𝗼𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗰𝗮.com.

Iin July 2020, Bernie created Graduate To Hired, an online workshop that helps students find jobs more efficiently with business strategies. Graduate To Hired is now at Illinois Tech, piloted to students in 2022, with its most recent student's power result: 12 interviews, 12 offers from 106 applications. 

²𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗿 𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲𝘀 Directors: How does your college attract/help more students find jobs fast & address ROI expectations? How are you making graduates more confident despite a deluge of applicants? Let's position your students earlier to find jobs before they need them.

Send me a DM for a quick chat to see if we could 

✅  Capitalize on shifting college relevance [that effectively thrusts career center results to the forefront],
✅  Boost graduate-to-hired ratios, 
✅  Increase students' confidence, and
✅  Make students' job search less frustrating with optimal results.

See #OneMinute tips in Featured below.

experiences.description:
I help families to optimize #Money IQ #FinancialHygiene. If you are equipped with correct information, you can plan properly and make the right decisions for your family, 𝗯𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗼𝘄𝗻 𝗺𝗼𝗻𝗲𝘆 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗿. We bridge financial education and financial independence.

World System Builder champions empowerment. Thirteen (13) free Zoom workshops weekly: we help you with financial basics to navigate financial complexities for your self-determined future.

Our mission: impact 30 million families positively by elevating your #MoneyIQ. 

We teach you how money works, how to increase cash flow, manage debt, create an emergency fund, build long-term asset accumulation, provide proper protection for their family, and preserve your estate for future generations.

A key aspect that sets World System Builder apart is our holistic approach. We don't just offer solutions; we collaborate to understand your unique goals and aspirations. Prioritizing your personalized financial strategies ensures a financial awakening tailored to your specific needs, partnering with you to help achieve your autonomy.

Our impact is profound. Commitment to your financial literacy and empowering your family in decisions with your hard-earned money drives our national campaign, shaping futures where all our dreams are achievable.  𝘄𝘄𝘄.𝗧𝗵𝗲𝗕𝗲𝗿𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗙𝗹𝗼𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗰𝗮.𝗰𝗼𝗺

recommendations:
Neil Shah



During my time at IIT, Bernie has always been my mentor for career related questions. His practical suggestions and ideas are directly aimed at solving the root causes and extremely effective too. His years of experience is evident when he bestows the approach towards business relations (networking) and strategies to surpass every stage of the interview. Moreover, I have personally felt he naturally connects and commits to the cause with every student and this differential is his X-Factor. Thank you, Bernie!

Thijs de Kool



Bernie Floresca is a growth catalyst extraordinaire! With his sharp strategic vision and knack for analyzing market trends, Bernie has an innate ability to uncover growth opportunities that others might overlook. What sets Bernie apart is not just his analytical skills, but also his genuine passion for fostering innovation and driving results. He's not afraid to think outside the box and take calculated risks to propel businesses forward. Bernie's leadership style is both inspiring and inclusive, bringing out the best in his team members and cultivating a culture of collaboration and excellence. With Bernie on board, you can trust that your business will not only grow but thrive in today's ever-evolving landscape.
